citations.narrative:
There were accumulations of excreta on top of the wire flooring in the third bottom enclosure on the right side of the rabbit
room. Inadequate cleaning of primary enclosures can can expose the rabbits to potential disease hazards and
uncomfortable quarters. Correct by ensuring that primary enclosures are kept reasonably free of excreta by regular
cleaning. Correct by December 12, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.56(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
There were accumulations of excreta on top of the wire flooring in the third bottom enclosure on the right side of the rabbit 
room. Inadequate cleaning of primary enclosures can can expose the rabbits to potential disease hazards and 
uncomfortable quarters. Correct by ensuring that primary enclosures are kept reasonably free of excreta by regular 
cleaning. Correct by December 12, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
